name: gulp-wavethrough
description: wavethrough a gulp pipeline stop, useful for conditional gulp pipe behaviour.

scripts.release: (npm test) && (git pull origin master && npm version patch && git push origin master && git checkout release && git merge master && git push origin release && git checkout master)
scripts.update: (git checkout master && git pull origin master) && (npm install)

author: Smart Coordination GmbH <office@push.rocks> (https://push.rocks)
